cancel_access.modal.confirmation.body: Cancelling this subscription will remove your ability to make changes to your Access configuration.
cancel_access.modal.confirmation.message: I understand that if I continue, my ability to make changes to my Access configuration will be removed.
cancel_access.modal.title: Cancel Access
cancel_app.modal.title: Cancel App
cancel_argo.modal.confirmation.body: If you cancel this subscription you will no longer be using Argo.
cancel_argo.modal.confirmation.message: I understand that if I continue, my website performance and bandwidth usage may degrade.
cancel_argo.modal.cost: $5 monthly fee per website plus $0.10 per GB of traffic
cancel_argo.modal.title: Cancel Argo
cancel_load_balancing.modal.confirmation: Cancelling this subscription will disable all of your Load Balancers and stop them from answering DNS queries.
I understand that if I continue, all of my Load Balancers will be disabled and no longer serve traffic.
cancel_load_balancing.modal.title: Cancel Load Balancing
If you cancel this subscription, you will lose all your rate limiting rules.
I understand that if I continue, all of my Rate Limiting rules will be deleted
cancel_rate_limiting.modal.title: Rate Limiting
cancel_stream.modal.confirmation.body: Cancelling this subscription will remove your ability to deliver to your Stream videos.
cancel_stream.modal.confirmation.message: I understand that if I continue, my ability to watch to Stream videos will be removed.
cancel_stream.modal.title: Cancel Stream
cancel_workers.modal.confirmation.body: Cancelling this subscription will disable all of your Workers and stop them from running.
cancel_workers.modal.confirmation.messag: I understand that if I continue, all of my Workers will be disabled and stop running.
cancel_workers.modal.title: Cancel Workers
edit.modal.dedicated_cert_change_result: Your monthly subscription now includes %{dedicatedCertsInfo} and %{dedicatedCertsCustomInfo}. You are using %{usedDedicatedCertCount} of %{totalDedicatedCertCount} and %{usedDedicatedCertCustomCount} of %{totalDedicatedCertCustomCount} these certificates, respectively.
edit.modal.dedicated_cert_downgrade_warn: You are currently using %{usedCertsInfo} that are included in your current subscription. Please first delete %{certsToDelete} on the [Crypto App](%{cryptoPageUrl}) before you can cancel your subscription.
edit.modal.dedicated_cert_increased_tip: To configure a new certificate, visit the Edge Certificates card on the [Crypto App](%{cryptoPageUrl}).
edit.modal.downgrade_warning: If you downgrade your plan you will lose features that may impact your website.
edit.modal.downgrade_warning_confirmatio: I understand that if I continue, some features may be disabled
edit.modal.page_rule_bundle.select.label: Additional Page Rules
edit.modal.page_rule_cancel_result: Your additional Page Rules have been cancelled.
edit.modal.page_rule_change_confirmation: Your Page Rules subscription will change from %{fromBundleCount} additional Page Rules for $%{fromBundlePrice}%{frequency} to %{toBundleCount} additional Page Rules for $%{toBundlePrice}%{frequency}
edit.modal.page_rule_change_result: You have changed your subscription level to %{purchasedPageRules} additional Page Rules. You now have %{totalPageRuleCount} Page Rules in total.
edit.modal.page_rule_downgrade_warning: You are currently using %{totalSubscribedPageRuleCount} Page Rules that are included in your current subscription. Please first delete %{pageRuleCountToDelete} Page Rules on the [Page Rules App](%{pageRulePageUrl}) before you can cancel your subscription.

legal.disclaimer: By clicking "%{buttonText}" you agree that you are purchasing a month-to-month subscription which will automatically renew unless you cancel your subscription(s) through your account dashboard before the beginning of your next monthly billing period. Please note that if you cancel your subscription mid-month you will still be charged for the entire month. For more information on Cloudflare's billing, renewal and cancellation policies please visit [www.cloudflare.com/terms](https://www.cloudflare.com/terms/)
